name: freeones
description: Scrape data from freeones.xxx. You do not need to have all possible Custom Fields. Custom Fields can only be named as follows (not case sensitive): Started, Ended, Hair Color, Eye Color, Ethnicity, Height, Weight, Birthplace, Zodiac, Bra, Chest, Cupsize, Waist, Hips, Measurements, Tattoos, Piercings

arguments.name: blacklist
arguments.description: Array of data fields to omit (possible values: 'started', 'ended', 'description', 'tattoos', 'piercings', 'measurements', 'zodiac', 'aliases', 'height', 'weight', 'avatar', 'bornOn', 'labels', 'hair color', 'eye color', 'ethnicity')

arguments.name: useImperial
arguments.description: Use imperial units for height and weight (possible values: 'true', 'false')
